sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Typography, Grid, Card, CardContent, TextField, Button, Box, Accordion, AccordionSummary, AccordionDetails } from '@mui/material'; import { LocationOn, Phone, Email, AccessTime, WhatsApp, ExpandMore, Emergency } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { ContactBackground } from '../components/BackgroundStyles'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('Message sent! We will respond within 24 hours.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); }; return ( Contact University of Ruhuna Canteen Phone Numbers Main Office +94 91 2245765 +94 77 1234567 Email Addresses Contact Us canteen@tech.ruh.ac.lk feedback@tech.ruh.ac.lk WhatsApp Support Quick Support +94 77 1234567 Available 24/7 Send us a Message
setFormData({...formData, name: e.target.value})} sx={{ '& .MuiOutlinedInput-root': { borderRadius: 3, fontSize: '1.1rem' } }} /> setFormData({...formData, email: e.target.value})} sx={{ '& .MuiOutlinedInput-root': { borderRadius: 3, fontSize: '1.1rem' } }} /> setFormData({...formData, message: e.target.value})} sx={{ '& .MuiOutlinedInput-root': { borderRadius: 3, fontSize: '1.1rem' } }} />
Visit Our Location Our Address Faculty of Technology
University of Ruhuna
Hapugala, Galle 80000
Sri Lanka Operating Hours Monday - Friday: 7:00 AM - 8:00 PM
Saturday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Sunday: Closed
Public Holidays: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM ðŸš¨ Emergency Contact Information Security +94 91 2245700 Medical Emergency +94 91 2245701 Campus Emergency +94 91 2245702 Frequently Asked Questions {[ { q: 'What are the canteen operating hours?', a: 'Monday-Friday: 7AM-8PM, Saturday: 8AM-6PM, Sunday: Closed' }, { q: 'Do you accept digital payments?', a: 'Yes, we accept all major digital payment methods including mobile banking' }, { q: 'Can I pre-order my meals?', a: 'Yes, use our digital ordering system to pre-order and skip the queue' }, { q: 'Do you cater to dietary restrictions?', a: 'Yes, we offer vegetarian options and can accommodate most dietary needs' } ].map((faq, index) => ( }> {faq.q} {faq.a} ))} ); }; export default Contact;
